p: The MIC values of S. hortensis were ranged from 0.07 to 0.15 μl/ml for E. coli, and 0.31 to 0.62 μl/ml for Salmonella. The MBC values were 0.15 and 0.625 μl/ml for E. coli and Salmonella, respectively. These results revealed that all tested bacteria were sensitive to the S. hortensis essential oil. In addition, our data indicated that E. coli isolated were a little more sensitive to this oil compared to Salmonella.
